Vietnamese (VI): ".........It truly is fun to read the records of old games from over a century ago, ...a journey searching for those players' thoughts. .........Then will the score sheet of my life also beckon those in the future to go on a journey searching for my thoughts? ......Hmph."

Perciò dovrebbe la testimonianza della mia vita attirare anche coloro che in futuro partiranno per cercare i miei pensieri? ... Hmph."

Steam (ST): We took enough time to regain our calm, ......and we each swore to our parents that we'd catch the culprit.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa

Russian (RU): "И как это так, запретная? Разве мы только что там не побывали? Такое чудом не назовёшь. Мы принесли ключ, один оборот, а затем мы оказались внутри. И всё. Не чудо, а какая‐то нелепость."

Steam (ST): As far as I could tell, I'd just been joking around, finding myself a bit irritated by the sob story this was turning into. ...But then Aunt Rosa suddenly jumped on me, with a really serious face.
Umineko Project (UP): I thought all I'd done was mess around because I didn't like the way the atmosphere had turned all sappy. ......But Auntie Rosa had suddenly jumped on me, with a really serious face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'd thought I had just been messing around because I hadn't liked the atmosphere of that story.......But then Rosa oba-san suddenly jumped on me, with a really serious face.
PC Japanese (JP): 何だかいい話のような雰囲気になったのが気に入らなくて、俺は茶化しただけのはずだった。……なのに楼座叔母さんが、急に大真面目な顔で食い掛かってくる。

Russian (RU): А я что, я просто пошутил, потому что мне не понравилась атмосфера вокруг той истории. ......Но тётя Роза неожиданно подпрыгнула ко мне с очень серьёзным лицом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Já que eu não gostava da atmosfera dramática que estava se criando, eu tentei brincar um pouco. ......Mas a tia Rosa veio para cima de mim de repente, com uma expressão séria.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Avevo pensato di essere nei guai perché non mi era piaciuta l'atmosfera di quella storia. ... Ma poi Rosa oba-san improvvisamente mi aggredì, con una faccia davvero seria.

Steam (ST): The deaths of six people had shaken us badly. When we learned about that weird magic circle and the history of the chapel, we felt as though we'd figured at least part of this puzzle out.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "You keep trying to "explain it all with humans"! Only when I've cornered all your theories completely...will I have my victory!! Come now, how will you undermine my defenses? What trick could a human have used to defeat them, hmm?"
Umineko Project (UP): "These "explanations with humans" you talk about! The time I fully exhaust those theories of yours will be the time of my victory!! Come now, how will you destroy it? If it was a human, what trick could they have used to defeat it, hmm~?"
